- Exterior wall: stucco finish on first floor; hairline cracks near bottom and at corner; monitor for widening cracks or moisture intrusion.
- Window: white framed window with interior blinds; minor paint wear on trim; inspect caulking around frame for deterioration.
- Base/grade: stucco base at ground level; small crack at lower left corner; ensure proper drainage and clearance from soil.
- Upper siding: white horizontal siding above stucco; trim shows paint wear/peeling; consider touch-up to prevent moisture ingress.
- Overall: no active water staining observed; repair cracks and re-caulk/paint as routine maintenance.
